TEXT.TITLE: TOTH ALUMINUM <TOTH> SHARE OFFERING UNDER WAY
TEXT.BODY: Toth Aluminum Corp said an offering of 2,500,000 common shares is under way at 1.875 dlrs each. It said another 5,993,577 shares are issuable on the exercise of outstanding options. Reuter
